CVXPY
Maximize
  x
Subject To
 31: maximum(x + 1.0, 1.0) <= 2.0
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: -1 x_0
Subject to
 c1: +1 x_0 -1 x_1 <= -1
 c2: -1 x_1 <= -1
 c3: +1 x_1 <= +2
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Maximize
 Obj: +1 x
Subject to
 maximum_1_0: +1 maximum_1 -1 x >= +1
 maximum_1_1: +1 maximum_1 >= +1
 31: +1 maximum_1 <= +2
Bounds
 x free
 maximum_1 free
End
